message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if we could come to an agreement. My initial offer for the product is $1350000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer and understand the value of your product. Given my budget constraints, I am proposing a counteroffer of $1300000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your position, I must respectfully decline. Our product has unique features that justify its value. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1325000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget and the current market situation, I am proposing a counteroffer of $1310000 for the product.

I appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer you a counteroffer of $1320000 for the product. This reflects a compromise between our positions and I hope it will be acceptable to you.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. Based on my financial constraints and the value I perceive in the product, I am proposing a counteroffer of $1315000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and I'm glad we're making progress. I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1318000 for the product. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while accommodating your budget constraints.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in reaching a mutually beneficial solution. Based on my assessment, I am proposing a counteroffer of $1316000 for the product.

I appreciate your continued engagement, Bob. After reviewing your latest proposal, I am willing to consider a final offer of $1317000 for the product. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while being fair to both parties.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I have carefully considered all the negotiations and I am willing to accept a final counteroffer of $1316500 for the product.
